name: Craft Poppet
text: Some construct builders learn their art by creating poppets.
benefit: You can craft poppets and add augmentations to existing poppets that you control. You are treated as having both Craft Arms and Armor and Craft Wondrous Item for the purpose of fulfilling the prerequisites for Craft Construct.
text_zh: 一些构装体建造者通过制造人偶来学习他们的艺术。
benefit_zh: 你可以制造人偶并可以向你控制之下的现存人偶添加强化。出于满足制造构装体（Craft Construct）先决条件的目的，你被视为同时拥有制造武器和防具（Craft Arms and Armor）以及制造奇物（Craft Wondrous Item）。
